Email Report through a Shiny Module

Source: R/email.R
emailReport.Rd

Email Report through a Shiny Module

emailReport()

emailReportUI(id, width = "100%", ...)

emailReportServer(id, dois)

Arguments

id

The id string to be namespaced (optional).
width

The width of the input, e.g. '400px', or '100%'; see validateCssUnit().
...

Arguments passed on to shiny::actionButton

inputId

The input slot that will be used to access the value.

label

The contents of the button or link--usually a text label, but you could also use any other HTML, like an image.

icon

An optional icon() to appear on the button.

Related Functions and Methods

Functions

  • emailReport: Test app

  • emailReportUI: Module UI

  • emailReportServer: Module server

See also

Other communicate: render_email(), runMetacheck(), smtp_send_metacheck()
